metadata.title: The VTuber Ranking
metadata.description: Explore PeakX for realtime VTuber Live Streams on YouTube. Stay updated on trends and find your favorite VTuber contents effortlessly.

index.title:
The Largest
VTuber Ranking
Database
index.description: We organize VTubers from all over the world. We will summarize the Super Chat earnings of VTubers like Hololive, Nijisanji, Independent VTubers and more.

socialProof.title: Find VTuber live streams, Easily
socialProof.description: PeakX was released in August 2024, and data registration began in November. Over 600 channels have already been added. Unleash the potential of live streaming.

error.title: An error has occurred
error.configuration: There is a problem with the server configuration.
error.accessDenied: Usually occurs, when you restricted access through the signIn callback, or redirect callback.
error.verification: Related to the Email provider. The token has expired or has already been used.

error.title: An error has occurred
error.message: If the problem persists, please write down the code above and contact us at <contact>here</contact>
error.oAuthSignin: An error occurred while building the authentication URL.
error.oAuthCallback: An error occurred while processing the response from the OAuth provider.
error.oAuthCreateAccount: Failed to create a user in the database.
error.callback: An error occurred while processing the callback.
error.oAuthAccountNotLinked: The email of the account is already linked, but this OAuth account is not linked.
error.configuration: There is a problem with the server configuration. Check if your options are correct.

verifyRequest.title: Verify your email
verifyRequest.description: Sign in link has been sent to the email
verifyRequest.content: Please check your email and click the link to sign in. If this is your first sign in, your account will be created at the same time.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Contact us about feature requests, advertising inquiries, bug reports, or any questions regarding PeakX.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Manage your profile information. This is what other fans can see.

metadata.title: Groups
metadata.description: Search for VTubers in an instant. Find your favorite VTubers from groups such as affiliated companies or individual groups.

metadata.title: {group} Overview - Talents and Live Streams
metadata.description: Discover the latest {group} streams, channel statistics, and upcoming events on PeakX. Stay connected with your favorite VTubers and never miss a moment of their live broadcasts!

metadata.title: {group} Channel Ranking - Compare Subscribers and Viewers
metadata.description: Explore comprehensive statistics on {group} channels with PeakX. Analyze performance metrics, track popular VTubers, and find insights to enhance your streaming experience. Stay updated on your favorite channels!

metadata.title: {channel} Overview - Super Chat, Live, Concurrent Viewers, Comments and Stream Times
metadata.description: Discover detailed stats, rankings, and live updates for {channel} on PeakX.

metadata.title: Super Chat Summary of {channel}
metadata.description: Explore the Super Chat earnings of {channel}! Discover total revenue and rankings for the past X days. Stay updated on your favorite VTuber's support trends effortlessly.

metadata.title: ASMR Videos on {channel}
metadata.description: Discover the complete list of ASMR from {channel}! Stay updated with their latest ASMR live and members only ASMR broadcasts. Never miss your favorite VTuber's streams!

metadata.title: {channel} Live Streams
metadata.description: Discover the complete list of live streams from {channel}! Stay updated with their latest live events and Super Chat events. Never miss your favorite VTuber's streams!

metadata.title: {channel} Concurrent viewers
metadata.description: Check the number of concurrent viewers for {channel}! Check the latest live streams and Super Chat rankings all at once. Don't miss your favorite streams! Enjoy!

metadata.title: {channel} Latest comments
metadata.description: Check out the latest comments on {channel}! Check out the latest live streams and Super Chat rankings all at once. Don't miss your favorite streams! Enjoy!

metadata.title: {channel} Stream Times
metadata.description: Discover {channel}'s streaming schedule, including active days, time slots, and durations! Access detailed insights to plan your viewing experience and never miss your favorite VTuber's streams.

metadata.title: {channel} FAQ
metadata.description: The FAQ page for {channel}. Find answers to questions about the person behind the channel, their content and activities. Explore more on PeakX.

metadata.title: {group} Live Streams
metadata.description: Discover live streams from {group} talents on PeakX! Stay updated with current broadcasts, interact with your favorite streamers, and find all past streams in one place. Join the {group} community today!

metadata.title: {group} Schedule
metadata.description: Check the schedule for upcoming {group} live streams on PeakX! Never miss a broadcast from your favorite talents. Plan your viewing ahead and enjoy interactive content in realtime!

metadata.title: {group}'s Past Live Streams
metadata.description: Explore past {group} live streams on PeakX! Watch replays and highlights of your favorite streams, ensuring you never miss out on the fun and entertainment from beloved talents.

dimension.most-cheered: Most Cheered from each {group}{gender} channel this season ({period}).

metadata.title: {title} - Earnings, Membership count, Concurrent viewers, Comments
metadata.commentForMembersOnly: Member-only live stream, no data available

dimension.concurrent-viewer: Concurrent Viewer Ranking from each {group}{gender} channel in {period}.
dimension.super-chat: Super Chat Ranking from each {group}{gender} live stream in {period}.
Super Chat Ranking from each {group}{gender} channel in {period}.

AboutUs.title: About Us
AboutUs.description: Learn more about our services and beliefs.

auth.selectMethod: Select a method to sign-in / sign-up
auth.terms: By continuing, you agree to PeakX's <terms>Terms of Use</terms> and <pp>Privacy Policy</pp>.

loginBonus.title: Daily login bonus!
loginBonus.description: Earn cheer tickets for logging in today
loginBonus.tips: Using tickets for talents will increase your ranking. Log in every day to collect tickets and use them as much as you can!

criteriaDescription.topFans: Use cheer tickets during the period

cumulative.title: Super Chat amount - This Month
cumulative.description: Check the cumulative amount this month.

monthly.title: Super Chat amount β - Past 1 Year
monthly.description: Check the monthly Super Chat amount.
monthly.label: Monthly Total

countsByDoW.title: Live Stream Counts By Day of the Week
countsByDoW.description: Shows the count of live streams on each day of the week.
countsByDoW.srOnly: The bar chart shows the count of live streams on each day of the week. This allows you to analyze which days of the week the channel is most active.
countsByDoW.srOnlyLoop: {count} is the count of live streams on {DoW}.

viewersByDoW.title: Viewers By Day of the Week

firstCheer.title: You haven't cheered yet!
firstCheer.description: {channel} hasn't been getting any fan cheer recently. Here's your chance to support {channel} and become the top fan!

profile.signUpForTicket: Sign-up for free and get cheer tickets

topFans.title: Top Fans
topFans.description: Fans who used the most cheer tickets in the past 30 days

dialog.title: Cheer {channel}
dialog.description: Use cheer tickets to cheer {channel}. You can use multiple tickets at once.

noTickets.title: Not enough cheer tickets
noTickets.description: At least one is required. Log in every day to get more tickets

error.title: Cheer Failed
error.description: There was an error processing your cheer. Please try again later.

form.name: Display name
form.saveTips: Please note that it may take a long time to save due to the AI ​​check that automatically verifies the appropriateness of the expression.
form.usernameRegex: Username must be alphanumeric and can only contain underscores (_)
form.moderationFailed: AI moderation failed. Please check the content you entered.

imageUploader.title: Crop image
imageUploader.description: Crop your profile picture to a square

grade.name: Grade
grade.notice1: Reference value based on PeakX AI
grade.notice2: This rating is a reference value based on PeakX's proprietary algorithm, and does not guarantee the absolute value or profitability of the channel.

supers.notice1: Calculated based on the amount of Super Chats and Super Stickers during the live stream.

talents.title: Talents
talents.description: Here is a list of YouTube channels for talents in {group} group.

live.title: Live now on air
live.description: Check out {group}'s YouTube live now on air for today!

scheduled.title: Schedule
scheduled.description: Check out {group}'s YouTube streaming schedule for today! We'll also introduce the YouTube channels of the {group} talents.

ended.title: Past Live Streams
ended.description: Check out all of {group}'s past YouTube live streams!

overview.title: Number of views and concurrent viewers

earnings.title: Earnings, Trends
earnings.notice: Earnings counting will begin once the live stream begins.
earnings.membersOnly: This live stream is for members only, so super chat will not be displayed.

superChat.title: Super Chat Chart
superChat.description: Super Chat events and cumulative amounts during the live stream.

superChatComments.title: List of Super Chat comments
superChatComments.notice: Super Chat counting will begin once the live stream begins.
superChatComments.membersOnly: This live stream is for members only, so super chat will not be displayed.

comments.title: List of comments posted on the video
comments.notice: Once the live stream ends, it will begin tallying user comments.

supersRanking.title: {period} Ranking
supersRanking.description: Ranking based on total amount of Super Chat & Sticker. All VTubers are ranked in 3 categories: "Overall", "Gender", and "Group".

channel.viewChannel: Here is the analysis of the channel

highlight-clip.title: Latest Highlight Clips
highlight-clip.description: Here are the highlight clips of {group}.

chart.descStreamTimeHistogram: Shows the frequency of YouTube Live streams in each time slot.
chart.srPeakConcurrentViewersChart: The bar graph shows the peak concurrent viewers for a live stream on {dateRange}. The number of average concurrent viewers is {viewers}.
chart.srViewsChart: The bar graph shows the number of views of live streams during {dateRange}. The average number of views is {views}.
chart.srViewsPerDoWChart: The bar graph shows the average number of views for videos uploaded on each day of the week. This allows you to analyze which days of the week tend to get more views.
chart.srViewsPerDoWChartLoop: Videos uploaded to {DoW} are played an average of {views} times.

card.chatRate: Number of messages sent in live chat per minute.
card.peakConcurrent: Highest number of viewers during a live stream
card.avgConcurrent: Average number of viewers during a live stream
card.membershipCount: New membership during a live stream
card.membershipAmount: New membership earnings during a live stream

stream.noLive: There are no live streams at the moment.
stream.noScheduled: There are no scheduled streams at the moment.
stream.noEnded: There are no live streams at the moment.

streamStats.srViewerCountsChart: The area graph shows the number of concurrent viewers over the course of {dateRange}. The maximum number of concurrent viewers at the peak was {peak}.
